companyName: Vondra Law Office - North Liberty, IA
description:
If you have sustained an injury or become ill because of a health care professional's negligence, the Vondra Law Office in Iowa City, Iowa, focuses on medical malpractice law. Consequently, our attorneys have the necessary knowledge, skill and experience to get you the compensation you deserve.

Our experience covers a wide spectrum of specific medical malpractice types, including:

  • Misdiagnosis, delayed diagnosis and failure to diagnose
  • Failure to properly treat
  • Emergency room errors
  • Surgical and anesthesia errors
  • Childbirth injuries
  • Medication errors

We also give you personalized attention from the time of your free initial consultation to the favorable resolution of your case. We always treat you as an individual, not as merely a case or a number. We take the time to get to know you, listen carefully to your story, answer all your questions and advise you of your available options. Then we devise a strategy to achieve your goals and objectives in an expeditious and cost-effective manner. In addition, if English is not your native language, no problem. Se habla espa√±ol.

The Vondra Law Office offers virtual appointments and accepts all major credit cards for our clients' maximum convenience in paying our eminently reasonable and highly competitive legal fees.
